content: अंशुमत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अंशु-अस्त्यर्थे मतुप्] {@--1@} Luminous, radiant; ज्योतिषां रविरंशुमान् <ls>Bg. 10. 21.</ls> {@--2@} Pointed. {@--3@} Fibrous, abounding in filaments (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (मान्) {@--1@} The sun; वालखिल्यैरिवांशुमान् <ls>R. 15. 10</ls>, <ls>Ki. 11. 6</ls>, <ls>Y. 3. 144</ls>; sometimes the moon also. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the grandson of Sagara, son of Asamañjasa and father of Dilīpa. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a mountain; °मत्फला <ab>N.</ab> of a plant कदली Musa Sapientum or Paradisiaca. --ती {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant सालपर्णी (<ab>Mar.</ab> डवला, सालवण) Hedysarum Gangeticum. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the river Yamunā.
